directions: Bring 1/2 cup pear nectar, sugar, and cardamom to a simmer in a small saucepan, stirring until sugar is dissolved. Stir into remaining pear nectar in a bowl and add lemon juice.
Freeze in ice cream maker. Serve sorbet over pears.
ingredients: Accompaniment: sliced firm-ripe pears tossed with fresh lemon juice
Special equipment: an ice cream maker
title: Pear and Cardamom Sorbet
